h3_title: Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide
content: Once enough damage has been sustained to its leg, you'll see its leg start to explode with light, meaning your attacks have successfully staggered the boss. He'll fall to the ground in a heap, with its sphere-like core right in front of you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Wise-Voice' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once enough damage has been sustained to its leg, you'll see its leg start to explode with light, meaning your attacks have successfully staggered the boss. He'll fall to the ground in a heap, with its sphere-like core right in front of you.
